data.title: The Unofficial Elder Scrolls Pages (UESP)
data.text:
Greg Keyes Role(s) Writer

Gregory Keyes (pen name Greg Keyes) is a writer that was responsible for writing a duology of Elder Scrolls novels between the release cycles of Oblivion and Skyrim.

Texts Authored[edit]

This list is non-exhaustive and includes only texts which have been confirmed to be written, fully or partially, by Keyes.

Books

The Infernal City: An Elder Scrolls Novel (edited by Kurt Kuhlmann and Bruce Nesmith)

Lord of Souls: An Elder Scrolls Novel (edited by Kurt Kuhlmann and Bruce Nesmith)

Interviews[edit]

Dec 2009: Reading the text: Greg Keyes interview

Jul 2010: Interview With Greg Keyes

Dec 2011: Split Screen: Lord of Scrolls

Development of the Greg Keyes Novels
